Desc.eng: Hey! You are the old hag who kidnapped Hansel and Gretel! We stopped you for good once!
Don’t believe those lies! I was the victim of two demon-possessed kids who wanted to eat my house and spread false rumors! Do you see any imprisoned children here?
Well, no. I guess I don’t have any business with you after all.
A gentleman! Here, take this necklace as a token of my gratitude.
Wait! Is this necklace made of tiny bones?
Of course not. Those are chocolate-coated biscuit sticks.
